actions.committee: House Committee on Interstate and Foreign Commerce
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Interstate and Foreign Commerce.

official_title: A bill to amend the Railroad Retirement Act of 1974 to provide that any railroad employee may retire on full annuity at age 55 with 30 years' service, and to provide for payment of full spouse's annuities at age 55 (or reduced spouse's annuities at age 52).

summary.text: Lowers the age at which eligible railroad employees and spouses become entitled to railroad retirement benefits under the Railroad Retirement Act of 1974.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Railroad Retirement Act of 1974 to provide that any railroad employee may retire on full annuity at age 55 with 30 years' service, and to provide for payment of full spouse's annuities at age 55 (or reduced spouse's annuities at age 52).
